title: Balancer DeFi Platform Hit by Major Exploit Resulting in $100M+ in Losses

content.raw: The decentralised finance (DeFi) ecosystem was rocked by a significant exploit targeting Balancer, one of the leading DeFi platforms. The breach specifically impacted Balancerâ€™s V2 Composable Stable Pools, resulting in losses that reportedly exceed $100 million.
